Welcome Guest
S.V.R Public School
Navigation header
Settings
View

To achieve the aims and objectives of a school, it is essential that a disciplined approach is adopted to all levels. We have taken great care to strengthen the discipline in the school which actually is a reflection of its soul and it assures a wholesome growth of students.

 Our approach to learning process involves some important and contemporary methods, learning takes place through a variety of student-driven activities, Projects, Workshops and Seminars by eminent personalities.

 Ours is a school , Which is vibrant in every sense of the word . There are several activities and the students experience situations outside the classroom , which emulate life . Students are happy and enjoy coming to school . Their opinions matter and they have an integral part to play in their own education .

We have adequate facilities of playgrounds and other instructions for games and sports. Provisions for football, cricket, volleyball and basketball have been availed to the students.\n\nStudents are also trained and promoted to take part in the tournaments organized by the govt and non-govt organizations..

A well furnished library accomplished with very near to 1,000 magazines , daily news paper and Books on various subjects and editions useful for the students in both school studies and extra knowledge is available.\n\n Students are encouraged to make maximum use of the library facility.

Bus facility is available for the students coming from remote areas on payment of certain charge fixed by the school authority. A detailed information regarding that can be availed from the counter persons. Charge vary with the length of route. \n\nThis charge is subject to change as or when required.

Beginning from Class LKG onwards, Computer Education is an integral part of the school curriculum. The students are trained in basic skills and techniques of Computer.Separate labs are available for Junior and senior students with specialized softwares and packages for each and every subject.\n\n It is further aided by Internet connections, which can be used under the proper guidance of instructors.

There are a few computers presently but the management is trying to enhance the number of computer according to requirement and to link the Lab. With internet and other possible modern facilities in due course to know the changes and development in the world day-to-day. It is running by a highly educated computer teacher.

The school has an own disciplinary chore but it is not much different from common conduct. Students are better educated putting a serve of self discipline and self respect. Placing trust in their intrinsic ability. Boys with a leadership aptitude are given event management opportunities.

The first and foremost what we expect from the guardians is their faith on us. In order the attain the high academic standard as well as the ideals and aims of the institute, a full co operation of the parents and guardians is essential. Parents are requested to keep an eye on their wards so that the ideals, as stated in the foregoing pages are followed by the students when they go home. Early rising, good manners and gentlemanly behavior, truthfulness and cleanliness should be observed with at home. Boys should not be allowed to see Cinema and TV shows accept those that are appropriate for them. The school cannot rise to perfection, unless the guardians have faith in the educational ideals of the institute and unless a full co operation is received from them.\n\nGuardians or parents may visit the school periodically to meet the concerned class teacher to take a view on his/her wards progress in academic and other behavioral grounds.

The school has its own best hostel facility for students. Parents/ Guardian desirous to admitting their children in the hostel will have to apply in the hostel application from separately. The student should be medically fit and should not have any physical deficiency/ shortcoming which may come in the day of his/ her participation in all school activities. A well balanced healthy and nourishing diet is ensured besides the three main meals the child gets MILK in the morning and seasonal FRUITS/ SNACKS in the recess.
